Serialized Form

  • Package Assignment3.presentationLayer

    • Class Assignment3.presentationLayer.MyButton

      class MyButton extends JButton implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • hoverBackgroundColor
          Color hoverBackgroundColor
          This field is the color the button will have when the mouse hovers over it
        • pressedBackgroundColor
          Color pressedBackgroundColor
          This field is the color the button will have when the mouse presses it

  • Package Assignment3.presentationLayer.views

    • Class Assignment3.presentationLayer.views.MainView

      class MainView extends JFrame implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • billsButton
          MyButton billsButton
          This field is the button the user needs to press in order to open up the Bills view
        • clientsButton
          MyButton clientsButton
          This field is the button the user needs to press in order to open up the first Clients view and based on the table of clients, choose what operation to perform on this table: Add, Edit or Delete
        • ordersButton
          MyButton ordersButton
          This field is the button the user needs to press in order to open up the first Orders view and based on the table of orders, choose what operation to perform on this table: Add, Edit or Delete
        • productsButton
          MyButton productsButton
          This field is the button the user needs to press in order to open up the first Products view and based on the table of products, choose what operation to perform on this table: Add, Edit or Delete

  • Package Assignment3.presentationLayer.views.bills

    • Class Assignment3.presentationLayer.views.bills.BillsView

      class BillsView extends JFrame implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • billsTable
          JTable billsTable
          This field is the table which will contain all the bills found in the Bill table of the database

  • Package Assignment3.presentationLayer.views.clients

    • Class Assignment3.presentationLayer.views.clients.ClientsView

      class ClientsView extends JFrame implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • addClientButton
          MyButton addClientButton
          This field is the button the user needs to press in order to open up the second Clients view and add a new client
        • clientsComboBox
          JComboBox<String> clientsComboBox
          This field is the combo box which will contain all the names of the existing clients so that the user can choose which client to edit/delete
        • clientsTable
          JTable clientsTable
          This field is the table which will contain all the clients found in the Client table of the database
        • deleteClientButton
          MyButton deleteClientButton
          This field is the button the user needs to press in order to open up the second Clients view and delete an existing client
        • editClientButton
          MyButton editClientButton
          This field is the button the user needs to press in order to open up the second Clients view and edit an existing client

    • Class Assignment3.presentationLayer.views.clients.ClientsView2

      class ClientsView2 extends JFrame implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • addClientButton
          MyButton addClientButton
          This field is the button the user needs to press in order to add a new client to the database
        • deleteClientButton
          MyButton deleteClientButton
          This field is the button the user needs to press in order to delete an existing client from the database
        • editClientButton
          MyButton editClientButton
          This field is the button the user needs to press in order to apply the modifications made to a certain client from the database
        • nameTextField
          JTextField nameTextField
          This field is the name text field, where the user enters the name of a client
        • phoneNumberTextField
          JTextField phoneNumberTextField
          This field is the phone number text field, where the user enters the phone number of a client
        • resetNameButton
          MyButton resetNameButton
          This field is the button the user needs to press in order to reset the String found in the nameTextField to the initial one
        • resetPhoneNumberButton
          MyButton resetPhoneNumberButton
          This field is the button the user needs to press in order to reset the String found in the phoneNumberTextField to the initial one
        • titleLabel
          JLabel titleLabel
          This field is the title label of this view. It changes based on the action the user is doing: Add, Edit or Delete

  • Package Assignment3.presentationLayer.views.orders

    • Class Assignment3.presentationLayer.views.orders.OrdersView

      class OrdersView extends JFrame implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • addOrderButton
          MyButton addOrderButton
          This field is the button the user needs to press in order to open up the second Orders view and add a new order
        • deleteOrderButton
          MyButton deleteOrderButton
          This field is the button the user needs to press in order to open up the second Orders view and delete an existing order
        • editOrderButton
          MyButton editOrderButton
          This field is the button the user needs to press in order to open up the second Orders view and edit an existing order
        • ordersComboBox
          JComboBox<String> ordersComboBox
          This field is the combo box which will contain all the ids of the existing orders so that the user can choose which order to edit/delete
        • ordersTable
          JTable ordersTable
          This field is the table which will contain all the orders found in the Orders table of the database

    • Class Assignment3.presentationLayer.views.orders.OrdersView2

      class OrdersView2 extends JFrame implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • addOrderButton
          MyButton addOrderButton
          This field is the button the user needs to press in order to add a new order to the database
        • clientComboBox
          JComboBox<String> clientComboBox
          This field is the client combo box, where the user chooses the client of an order
        • deleteOrderButton
          MyButton deleteOrderButton
          This field is the button the user needs to press in order to delete an existing order from the database
        • editOrderButton
          MyButton editOrderButton
          This field is the button the user needs to press in order to apply the modifications made to a certain order from the database
        • productComboBox
          JComboBox<String> productComboBox
          This field is the product combo box, where the user chooses the product of an order
        • quantityTextField
          JTextField quantityTextField
          This field is the quantity text field, where the user enters the quantity of an order
        • resetClientButton
          MyButton resetClientButton
          This field is the button the user needs to press in order to reset the selected item found in the clientComboBox to the initial one
        • resetProductButton
          MyButton resetProductButton
          This field is the button the user needs to press in order to reset the selected item found in the productComboBox to the initial one
        • resetQuantityButton
          MyButton resetQuantityButton
          This field is the button the user needs to press in order to reset the String found in the quantityTextField to the initial one
        • titleLabel
          JLabel titleLabel
          This field is the title label of this view. It changes based on the action the user is doing: Add, Edit or Delete
